review: My mom stays with me and watches things on YouTube ALL THE TIME. She had bought some "box" for $200 to watch things on the internet, but I  opted to try out this out since, hey I have prime and it's only $35. I tested it out when I got it and was like "WHAT THE HELL WAS I MISSING ALL MY LIFE?!" It has the main apps that I want (Netflix, YouTube, Hulu) and it has my Amazon videos! I completely forgot about them until today.Got my mom's YouTube stuff set up so she can watch on the regular sized screen and I just ordered another one for my bedroom. Last time I tried to watch some stuff on NetFlix via my PS3 and for some reason, I couldn't connect. I'm glad this works out great.
